Package org.bonitasoft.engine.api

Interface PageAPI

  • public interface PageAPI
    This API gives access to all page features. Page is a way to add pages on portal.

    Also allows to manipulate Pages, through creation, deletion, search.

    Author:
    Laurent Leseigneur
    See Also:
    Page

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Page createPage​(String contentName, byte[] content)
      create a page using the given content the content must contain a page.properties file that contains information on the page: name, displayName and description.
      Page createPage​(PageCreator pageCreator, byte[] content)
      Creates a custom page.
      void deletePage​(long pageId)
      Deletes a page identified by its ID.

      Deletes a list of pages, given by their IDs.

      Retrieves a page from its ID.

      Retrieves a page from its name.

      Retrieves a page from its name and processDefinitionId.

      Retrieves the binary content of a page.

      Resolves a Page URL from a specific key.

      Searches for pages with specific search criteria.

      • getPage

        Page getPage​(long pageId)
      throws PageNotFoundException
        Retrieves a page from its ID.
        Parameters:
        pageId - the Identifier of the page to retrieve
        Returns:
        the found page
        Throws:
        PageNotFoundException - if no page can be found with the provided ID.

      • getPageByName

        Page getPageByName​(String name)
            throws PageNotFoundException
        Retrieves a page from its name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the page to retrieve
        Returns:
        the found page
        Throws:
        PageNotFoundException - if no page can be found with the provided page or is assigned with a process definition.

      • getPageByNameAndProcessDefinitionId

        Page getPageByNameAndProcessDefinitionId​(String name,
                                         long processDefinitionId)
                                  throws PageNotFoundException
        Retrieves a page from its name and processDefinitionId.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the page to retrieve
        processDefinitionId - the process definition ID associated to the page
        Returns:
        the found page
        Throws:
        PageNotFoundException - if no page can be found with the provided name and process definition ID.

      • getPageContent

        byte[] getPageContent​(long pageId)
               throws PageNotFoundException
        Retrieves the binary content of a page.
        Parameters:
        pageId - the ID of the page to extract the content for.
        Returns:
        the binary content of the page.
        Throws:
        PageNotFoundException - if no page can be found with the provided ID.

      • searchPages

        SearchResult<Page> searchPages​(SearchOptions searchOptions)
                        throws SearchException
        Searches for pages with specific search criteria.
        Parameters:
        searchOptions - the search options for the search. See SearchOptions for search option details.
        Returns:
        the SearchResult containing
        Throws:
        SearchException - if a problem occurs during the search.

      • createPage

        Page createPage​(PageCreator pageCreator,
                byte[] content)
         throws AlreadyExistsException,
                CreationException,
                InvalidPageTokenException,
                InvalidPageZipContentException
        Creates a custom page. Note that if called from an operation in a task, the author of the page will always be the user System.
        Parameters:
        pageCreator - the creator object to instantiate the new page.
        content - the binary content of the page.
        Returns:
        the newly created page.
        Throws:
        AlreadyExistsException - if a page with this name already exists.
        CreationException - if an error occurs during the creation.
        InvalidPageTokenException
        InvalidPageZipContentException

      • updatePage

        Page updatePage​(long pageId,
                PageUpdater pageUpdater)
         throws UpdateException,
                AlreadyExistsException,
                UpdatingWithInvalidPageTokenException,
                UpdatingWithInvalidPageZipContentException
        Updates a custom page.
        Parameters:
        pageId - the Identifier of the page to update
        pageUpdater - the creator object to instantiate the new page.
        Returns:
        the newly created page.
        Throws:
        UpdateException - if an error occurs during the update.
        AlreadyExistsException - if a page with this name already exists.
        UpdatingWithInvalidPageTokenException
        UpdatingWithInvalidPageZipContentException

      • updatePageContent

        void updatePageContent​(long pageId,
                       byte[] content)
                throws UpdateException,
                       UpdatingWithInvalidPageTokenException,
                       UpdatingWithInvalidPageZipContentException
        Updates a custom page content. it read the page.properties inside to update the page properties
        Parameters:
        pageId - the Identifier of the page to update
        content - the binary content of the page.
        Throws:
        UpdateException - if an error occurs during the update.
        UpdatingWithInvalidPageTokenException
        UpdatingWithInvalidPageZipContentException

      • deletePage

        void deletePage​(long pageId)
         throws DeletionException
        Deletes a page identified by its ID.
        Parameters:
        pageId - the page identifier to delete.
        Throws:
        DeletionException - if a problem occurs during deletion.

      • deletePages

        void deletePages​(List<Long> pageIds)
          throws DeletionException
        Deletes a list of pages, given by their IDs.
        Parameters:
        pageIds - a list of page identifiers to delete.
        Throws:
        DeletionException - if a problem occurs during deletion.

      • createPage

        Page createPage​(String contentName,
                byte[] content)
         throws AlreadyExistsException,
                CreationException,
                InvalidPageTokenException,
                InvalidPageZipContentException
        create a page using the given content the content must contain a page.properties file that contains information on the page: name, displayName and description. Be aware that this method does not update your web permission-mappings. It means that rest api extensions created with this method will not be accessible from the portal. To avoid the problem, either use the create page rest api or upload the extensions directly from Bonita Portal. Note that if called from an operation in a task, the author of the page will always be the user System.
        Parameters:
        contentName - name of the zip file containing the page
        content - content of the zip file containing the page
        Returns:
        the created page
        Throws:
        AlreadyExistsException - if a page with the same name already exists
        CreationException
        InvalidPageTokenException
        InvalidPageZipContentException
        Since:
        6.3.1

      • getPageProperties

        Properties getPageProperties​(byte[] content,
                             boolean checkIfItAlreadyExists)
                      throws InvalidPageTokenException,
                             AlreadyExistsException,
                             InvalidPageZipMissingPropertiesException,
                             InvalidPageZipMissingIndexException,
                             InvalidPageZipInconsistentException,
                             InvalidPageZipMissingAPropertyException
        Read the content of the page zip file check it is consistent and return it's properties
        Parameters:
        content - content of the zip file containing the page
        Returns:
        the properties of the page
        Throws:
        InvalidPageTokenException
        AlreadyExistsException
        InvalidPageZipMissingPropertiesException
        InvalidPageZipMissingIndexException
        InvalidPageZipInconsistentException
        InvalidPageZipMissingAPropertyException
        Since:
        6.4.0

      • resolvePageOrURL

        PageURL resolvePageOrURL​(String key,
                         Map<String,​Serializable> context,
                         boolean executeAuthorizationRules)
                  throws NotFoundException,
                         UnauthorizedAccessException,
                         ExecutionException
        Resolves a Page URL from a specific key.
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the page to resolve.
        Returns:
        the PageURL containing the pageId or the complete
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - if the key does not match anything.
        UnauthorizedAccessException
        ExecutionException
        See Also:
        the structured PageURL that points to the Page or URL
